lines.text: How'd he die? Well, he's a Go Wizard, so...
C'mon, you're laughing, right? Admit it! That was a good one!
...I didn't do anything to deserve this.
I'm a decent man, for cryin' out loud.
(He's happy. He liked that. I'm fantastic at jokes.)
Maybe there's some kind of turf war going on!
Like, groups of wizards on opposite sides, using tattoos as their gang signs!
Someone saw he had these tattoos, and knew he was from a rival gang, so... pop!
Wait, I'm confused. Does he even have those tattoos?
